page.title: 11EDUCATION _ Essendon School
page.content: The present school was built in 1948 after the second world war. The orig_ inal school was demolished by a bomb during the war and the children were taught in the old village school. The old school was on the site of the present police house and the children that attended were aged from 5 yrs. to 14 yrs. The new school takes children from 5 _ 11 yrs, then they go on to secondary school. It is made from concrete slabs and has a flat roof. It has three classrooms and a large hall which is used for dinners, P.E., assemblies and concerts. The infant classroom was added later. Our playground is surrounded by fields and woods. The playing field is sloping with a climbing_frame.
